sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comthdbmntrngloginfo ( DATA_SOURC_NM /* */ , SERVER_NM /* */ , DBMS_KND /* */ , CECK_SQL /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS /* */ , LOG_INFO /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LOG_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #dataSourcNm# /* */ , #serverNm# /* */ , #dbmsKnd# /* */ , #ceckSql# /* */ , #mngrNm# /* */ , #mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , #mntrngSttus# /* */ , #logInfo# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #logId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comthdbmntrngloginfo SET DATA_SOURC_NM=#dataSourcNm# /* */ , SERVER_NM=#serverNm# /* */ , DBMS_KND=#dbmsKnd# /* */ , CECK_SQL=#ceckSql# /* */ , MNGR_NM=#mngrNm# /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES=#mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS=#mntrngSttus# /* */ , LOG_INFO=#logInfo# /* */ , CREAT_DT=#creatDt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LOG_ID=#logId# /* */ WHERE LOG_ID=#logId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT DATA_SOURC_NM /* */ , SERVER_NM /* */ , DBMS_KND /* */ , CECK_SQL /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS /* */ , LOG_INFO /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LOG_ID /* */ FROM comthdbmntrngloginfo WHERE LOG_ID=#logId# /* */

SELECT DATA_SOURC_NM /* */ , SERVER_NM /* */ , DBMS_KND /* */ , CECK_SQL /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS /* */ , LOG_INFO /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LOG_ID /* */ FROM comthdbmntrngloginfo WHERE 1=1
DATA_SOURC_NM = #searchKeyword# /* */
SERVER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY LOG_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comthdbmntrngloginfo WHERE 1=1
DATA_SOURC_NM = #searchKeyword# /* */
SERVER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
